SEARCH
Package fang2.transformers

Class BounceTransformer

java.lang.Object
fang2.transformers.BounceTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformer, VelocityProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
BounceInsideRectangleTransformer, BounceSpriteTransformer
public class BounceTransformer extends Object implements Transformer, VelocityProvider
Shared root for all Bounce transformers. This class is a decorator of VelocityProvider objects. It is a velocity provider so that it provides velocity (which moves a sprite it transforms automatically) and it wraps around a velocity provider so that it has something to change when it is told to bounce. Subclasses determine when to bounce.
